message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $120. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price point. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am looking for a price closer to my budget. Would you consider selling the product for $95?
Hi Bob, I understand your position.  While $120 represents the value I place on the product, I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you consider $107.50?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, would you be open to selling the product for $100?
